title: Fire Emblem: Three Houses
summary: Fire Emblem: Three Houses[lower-alpha 1] is a tactical role-playing game developed by Intelligent Systems and Koei Tecmo[lower-alpha 2] for the Nintendo Switch and published worldwide by Nintendo. It is the sixteenth installment in the Fire Emblem series[lower-alpha 3] and the first one for home consoles since Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn, originally released in 2007.
